page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: As there is no school in Burtle most of the children of Burtle go to school at{Catcott }primary school. Most of the children enjoy school;The thing they like about school most of all is playtimes.Some of the children do not go to school in{Cattcott}they go to a different school in Wells.The children get a great deal of help with there work at school the children get alot of extra help at home from thier Mothers and Farthers with thier school work when they get home from school.As there school is quite far away they get to there school by bus and after school has finished for the day the childrens mothers and farthers come in thier cars and pick them up and dive them all the way back to {Burtle.
